title: Announcements
abstract:
Venue :
Language Lab 2nd Floor , M-Block, IET Campus

Those who did not play any games on Friday 7th Feb, can play on Saturday 8th Feb from 10 A.M to 5 P.M

If you missed the opportunity to play, grab this one more chance and prove that YOU ARE THE KING OF GAMERZ WORLD..

For details Contact

Kishore Rajendra +91 7898754430

Anoop +91 9424594746

title: Welcome Gamers
abstract:
Come, join us to experience the ultimate thrill of LAN gaming with unexpected competitors

Games Being Played
Call of Duty:Modern Warfare 1
Counter Strike 1.6 FInal
FIFA 14
NFS Most Wanted (Old)

Note: Those who haven't played on 7th Feb, can play on 8th Feb and FInals will be held on 9th Feb.

Rules and Structure
Download General Rules

When and Where
7-9 Feb, 2014 , 10 AM to 5 PM , IIT Indore,IET-DAVV Campus

For details Contact
Kishore Rajendra +91 7898754430
Anoop +91 9424594746

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
abstract:
This year, We have included this game seeing huge participation on Internet Servers. Buckle Up and get ready to dive into this world of immersive graphics. Don't miss the chance to really kick some ***...

And Win Amazing Prizes

Note: Those who haven't played on 7th Feb, can play on 8th Feb and FInals will be held on 9th Feb.

Rules and Structure
Team should consist of 4 members. If insufficient members are there in the team, adjustments will be made.
No need to bring own Laptops for playing

Registration Fee - Rs. 25/- per team member

Register Here - http://goo.gl/ODlK6V

When and Where
7-9 Feb, 2014 , 10 AM to 5 PM , IIT Indore,IET-DAVV Campus

For details Contact
Kishore Rajendra +91 7898754430
Anoop +91 9424594746

title: Counter Strike 1.6
abstract:
